cause.description:
Architecture for Humanity is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization that seeks architectural solutions to humanitarian crisis and brings professional design services to communities in need. Each year 10,000 people directly benefit from structures designed and built by Architecture for Humanity. Our advocacy, training and outreach programs impact an additional 50,000 people annually. We channel global resources to meaningful projects that make a difference locally. From conception to completion, we manage all aspects of the design and construction process. Our current work includes Post-Katrina affordable housing; youth centers in Kenya, Rwanda and South Africa; sports for change facilities in Afghanistan and Brazil; health centers in Myanmar and school upgrading in the India and the United States. Please visit our website at www.architectureforhumanity.org
1. Providing design services to communities in need.
2. Implement innovative and sustainable design solutions
3. Create dignified structures for all.
